data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 18108, Version Hash: 37823a4013302e76fd7f8f7f59b906bb4ce278bf
data.actual_result: Error box "A JavaScript error occured in the main process" appears and Discord stuck (startup window without prog. bar).
data.expected_result: Message like "failed to download" should appear (like when there is no internet connection when Discord is starting).
data.short_description: Discord crash when internet disconnects during update downloading
data.steps_to_repro: - Just disconnect the internet connection when Discord will be downloading updates during startup
